comment.author: 36196524@N08
comment._content: ...........Busby presumably being the same Busby of Busby's Bore, which carried water to the city from Centennial Park.  Is the stream in the sketch the Tank Stream?

comment.author: 27331537@N06
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/36196524@N08] The Tank Stream "originated from a swamp to the west of present day Hyde Park and at high tide entered Sydney Cove at the intersection of Bridge and Pitt Streets." en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tank_Stream
